title: Theology and Draper and The Fall And Theology (Conversation with Gemini)
subtitle: Tool vs Idol; Model vs Reality
description: A hinge-artifact marking a refusal to let probabilistic explanation replace the encounter of wonder. Defends a theism big enough to contain tragedy without reducing it to a simplistic evidentiary problem.

motifMap.meaning: Jurisdiction of certain evidence types; method idolized as truth
The honest scale of existence; encounter vs. explanation
Evidence that is inadmissible in a purely probabilistic tribunal; sacramental reality

excerpt: If your math makes God smaller, your math is not neutral—it is already a creed. I won’t worship the unsurprising.

sourceInputs: Phase Analysis 3.0 — Theology and Draper and The Fall And Theology (Conversation with Gemini)

integrity.notes: Generated based on Phase Analysis 3.0 for Theology and Draper artifact. Primary Phase identified as Trickster Prophet.
